Background .Overview of biomedical natural language processing .Research in the field of NLP is concerned with the development of systems that take textual data ( e.g. , research articles or abstracts ) as input and/or output .Examples of these systems encompass " core " tasks that often provide components of larger systems , such as syntactic analysis or semantic disambiguation , as well as practical applications for tasks such as summarisation , information extraction and translation .
